mapper.select: SELECT id, name, mail, role FROM users WHERE deleted = false ORDER BY id
SELECT id, name, password, mail, role, deleted FROM users WHERE mail = #{mail} AND deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, password, mail, role, deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{password}, #{mail}, #{role}, FALSE)
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, mail = #{mail}, role = #{role}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET deleted = true WHERE id = #{id}
